title: USB C to C not working unless device is switched off when plugged in.
content:
I have a Pixel XL. Charging with a USB A to C cable is fine, but in order to get a C to C cable working I need to first switch off the device. When plugged in the battery thing shows on the screen and the phone remains charging after switching it back on. 

I downloaded the latest firmware from Google and used the C to C cable to flash it. No problems with that. My phone is currently "Charging rapidly" while connected to my PC's USB C port, but I need to switch off the device every time I plug it in for it to do anything.
